fullText:
We noticed you're using an ad blocker.
			We get it: you like to have control of your own internet experience. But advertising revenue helps support our journalism. To read our full stories, please turn off your ad blocker.We'd really appreciate it.

Below are steps you can take in order to whitelist Observer.com on your browser:

Click the AdBlock button on your browser and select Don't run on pages on this domain.

Click the AdBlock Plus button on your browser and select Enabled on this site.

Click the AdBlock Plus button on your browser and select Disable on Observer.com.
dtliExcerpt: Hell's Kitchen is a jukebox musical that works because it's not really a jukebox musical at all—it's a deeply personal story that happens to be told through the songs of Alicia Keys.
showScoreExcerpt: Hell's Kitchen is a jukebox musical that works because it's not really a jukebox musical at all—it's a deeply personal story that happens to be told through the songs of Alicia Keys.
textIssues: Show title not found in text

llmScore.reasoning: GPT-4o-mini: The review does not contain any content related to the performance or production, only addressing an ad blocker issue, indicating a complete lack of recommendation.
